answers.text: Update the Nitro Hypervisor to a new version.
Migrate to a different version of the Hypervisor.
Nothing. This is AWS's responsibility as per the Shared Responsibility Model.
Call up AWS Support and complain about the issue.

text: The EC2 Nitro Hypervisor is having issues and not delivering the right level of performance. You have been called in to deal with this problem. What do you do?
